mainText: I heart goes out to the Job's family and friends after hearing of their loss.   I have been an apple consumer since 1984 and have followed the company since then.  I feel a great loss, even though I have never met Mr Jobs, there is a connection to the company and he was the company.  It is my hope that the next generation of apple innovators will share the same passion that Mr Jobs had shown and that I try to obtain everyday....because of him.
author: D.P. Potena
